languages.text: Защита беспомощных от гнусных замыслов дарует ей силы, истребление разрушителей душ даст ей цель. Оплетая корабль нитями Кровавой паутины, да искупит тень свои грехи. Он — есть Смерть.

Preserving the defenceless from heinous designs would give her strength; eradicating the ruiners of souls would give her purpose. The shadow would wrap the Bloodspun Web's threads around the ship and thus be redeemed of her flaws. He is Death.
languages.original_text: Защита беспомощных от гнусных замыслов дарует ей силы, истребление разрушителей душ даст ей цель. Оплетая корабль нитями Кровавой паутины, да искупит тень свои грехи. Он — есть Смерть.

traits.locale_text: Caring for the weak and the miserable would give her strength to weave the Bloodspun Web's threads around the ship, that the shadow might thus be redeemed of her sins. Ayen Kaen Dho.

Preserving the defenceless from heinous designs would give her strength; eradicating the ruiners of souls would give her purpose. The shadow would wrap the Bloodspun Web's threads around the ship and thus be redeemed of her flaws. He is Death.

languages.text: Die Bewahrung der Schutzlosen vor gottlosen Plänen würde ihr Stärke verleihen ... und die Vernichtung der Seelenzerstörer einen Sinn. Der Schatten würde die Fäden des Blutgesponnenen Netzes um das Schiff wickeln und sie von ihren Makeln befreien. Er ist der Tod.
languages.original_text: Preserving the defenceless from heinous designs would give her strength; eradicating the ruiners of souls would give her purpose. The shadow would wrap the Bloodspun Web's threads around the ship and thus be redeemed of her flaws. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Die Bewahrung der Schutzlosen vor gottlosen Plänen würde ihr Stärke verleihen ... und die Vernichtung der Seelenzerstörer einen Sinn. Der Schatten würde die Fäden des Blutgesponnenen Netzes um das Schiff wickeln und sie von ihren Makeln befreien. Er ist der Tod.

languages.text: Preservar a los indefensos de atroces designios le daría fuerza; erradicar a los destructores de almas les daría un propósito. La sombra envolvería la nave con los hilos de la Red Sanguinolenta y enmendaría así sus errores. Es la Muerte.
languages.original_text: Preserving the defenceless from heinous designs would give her strength; eradicating the ruiners of souls would give her purpose. The shadow would wrap the Bloodspun Web's threads around the ship and thus be redeemed of her flaws. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Preservar a los indefensos de atroces designios le daría fuerza; erradicar a los destructores de almas les daría un propósito. La sombra envolvería la nave con los hilos de la Red Sanguinolenta y enmendaría así sus errores. Es la Muerte.

languages.text: 凶悪な企てから無防備な人々を守ることが彼女に力を与え、魂を破滅させる者たちを根絶することが目的を与える。その影はブラッドスパン・ウェブの糸を船に巻きつけ、彼女の欠陥を贖うのだ。彼は死だ。
languages.original_text: Preserving the defenceless from heinous designs would give her strength; eradicating the ruiners of souls would give her purpose. The shadow would wrap the Bloodspun Web's threads around the ship and thus be redeemed of her flaws. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: 凶悪な企てから無防備な人々を守ることが彼女に力を与え、魂を破滅させる者たちを根絶することが目的を与える。その影はブラッドスパン・ウェブの糸を船に巻きつけ、彼女の欠陥を贖うのだ。彼は死だ。

languages.text: 她渴望守护手无寸铁之人，让他们免受十恶不赦的阴谋所害。她的同情心赋予了她力量，她渴望消灭损害他人灵魂的恶徒。由是，影子得以在舰船上编织深红色的罗网，弥补她的缺陷。祂便是死亡本身。
languages.original_text: Preserving the defenceless from heinous designs would give her strength; eradicating the ruiners of souls would give her purpose. The shadow would wrap the Bloodspun Web's threads around the ship and thus be redeemed of her flaws. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: 她渴望守护手无寸铁之人，让他们免受十恶不赦的阴谋所害。她的同情心赋予了她力量，她渴望消灭损害他人灵魂的恶徒。由是，影子得以在舰船上编织深红色的罗网，弥补她的缺陷。祂便是死亡本身。

languages.text: Protéger les innocents sans défense contre les manigances scélérates lui donnerait la force, et éradiquer les profanateurs d'âmes donnerait un sens à sa vie. L'ombre tisserait les fils de la Toile de Sang autour du vaisseau et ainsi, ses péchés seraient rachetés. Il est la mort incarnée.
languages.original_text: Preserving the defenceless from heinous designs would give her strength; eradicating the ruiners of souls would give her purpose. The shadow would wrap the Bloodspun Web's threads around the ship and thus be redeemed of her flaws. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Protéger les innocents sans défense contre les manigances scélérates lui donnerait la force, et éradiquer les profanateurs d'âmes donnerait un sens à sa vie. L'ombre tisserait les fils de la Toile de Sang autour du vaisseau et ainsi, ses péchés seraient rachetés. Il est la mort incarnée.

languages.text: Savunmasızları habis tasarımlardan korumak ona güç bahşedecekti. Ruhları perişan edenleri ortadan kaldırmak ona amaç bahşedecekti. Gölge, Kanipi Ağı'nın ipliklerini geminin etrafına saracaktı. Böylelikle kusurlarının bedeli ödenecekti. O Ölüm'dür.
languages.original_text: Preserving the defenceless from heinous designs would give her strength; eradicating the ruiners of souls would give her purpose. The shadow would wrap the Bloodspun Web's threads around the ship and thus be redeemed of her flaws. He is Death.
